Falling asleep .. staying asleep .. your standard 4 hours broken sleep .. you get used to it after 4 years . 

Youâ€™re a zombie . Soulless . Like going to a dentist and your mouth is numbed . You have no appetite for life anymore . Your tastebuds donâ€™t even work .
